author: agnxsh
content:
update from Nimbus:
we are done updating most things related to `decoupling network subnets from das core`
with the upcoming consensus-specs release we shall be able to test the vectors of `get_custody_groups`, right now it's stubbed as `get_custody_columns` and will be so until the next cl spec release.

https://github.com/status-im/nimbus-eth2/pull/6789

coming to peerdas compatibility >= fulu, apart from column syncing, we're mostly ready with the other parts.

author: jtraglia
content: Regarding test vectors, we publish nightly test vectors here: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/actions/workflows/generate_vectors.yml
